description.value:
A Small rounded lump that glows a slowly shifting shade and colour. Counts as a Charm and sheds dim light around the wearer about as bright as a candle. Characters from Hive Volg gain +10 to Tests made to avoid pinning.

Requirements

Scarce on Hive Volg, Very Rare Elsewhere

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 300 T
description.summary: A Small rounded lump that glows a slowly shifting shade and colour. Counts as a Charm and sheds dim light around the wearer about as bright as a candle. Characters from Hive Volg gain +10 to Tests mad
